DOC.brief_summary: Comparison two randomize group : - caesarean section plan 38 week 2 antenatal injection 12 mg betamethasone 48 h . - caesarean section plan 39 week without corticosteroid . The aim demonstrate program caesarean section 38 week pregnancy , antenatal corticosteroid , allow avoid caesarean section emergency ( labour 39 week ) , without increase neonatal respiratory distress rate .
DOC.criteria: woman need elective caesarean section multiple pregnancy toxaemia rhesus immunization fetal infection maternal gastroduodenal ulcer mother HIV+ prior injection corticosteroid pregnancy
